We started WriteDaily because we had trouble with our own writing. Whether you're writing the next big novel, considering a career in journalism, or just looking to put some polish on your everyday writing, we wanted to create a stress free platform for writers to practice and share their work with others.

1) Choose a Focus

2) Get Emailed

With new writing prompts every day

3) Start Writing!

With custom prompts, to hone your skills through practice.

3) Share It!

Or keep it just for you, with pre-formatted posts on Medium.com.
